content: pumpkin with lid by mimi s alelis materials 1 skein acrylic worsted weight yarn orange i used monaco 4-ply acrylic 18 gms per skein and small amount green size 4 50mm hook tapestry needle for finishing abbreviations slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet st = stitch chain = chain special stitch fpdc front post double_crochet yo insert hook from front to back to the front of the work working around the double_crochet below yo draw through loop yo draw through 2 loops on hook twice gauge not important size approx 3 ½ inches tall including stem instructions note chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet in each round always join rnds with slip_stitch with size 4 5mm hook and 4-ply acrylic yarn in orange round 1 chain 4 13 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook join with slip_stitch on top of starting chain 3 14 double_crochet round 2 chain 3 2 double_crochet in each double_crochet around 28 double_crochet round 3 chain 3 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet 2dc in next double_crochet around 42 double_crochet round 4 chain 3 double_crochet in next 5 double_crochet fpdc in next double_crochet double_crochet in next 6 double_crochet fpdc in next double_crochet around 42 double_crochet round 5 repeat round 4 round 6 chain 3 double_crochet in next 3 double_crochet double_crochet decrease the next 2 double_crochet fpdc on fpdc double_crochet decrease the next 2 double_crochet double_crochet in next 4 double_crochet fpdc on fpdc double_crochet in next 4 double_crochet double_crochet decrease the next 2 double_crochet fpdc on fpdc double_crochet decrease the next 2 double_crochet double_crochet in next 4 double_crochet fpdc on fpdc repeat around 36 double_crochet sts round 7 chain 3 double_crochet in next double_crochet double_crochet decrease the next 2 double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet fpdc on fpdc double_crochet in next 2 double_crochet double_crochet decrease the next 2 double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet fpdc on fpdc repeat around 30 double_crochet round 8 single_crochet in next 4 double_crochet fpsc on fpdc around 30 sts fasten_off weave in ends with needle lid round 1 with green yarn chain 2 6 single_crochet on 2nd chain from hook join to 1st single_crochet chain 6 slip_stitch on 2nd chain from hook and on the next 3 chain cut off yarn leaving 6 inches for sewing carefully insert the stem into the center hole of round 1 sew in place round 2 join orange on any single_crochet chain 3 2 double_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 double_crochet round 3 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet fpdc on the same double_crochet around 24 double_crochet round 4 single_crochet in next 4 double_crochet fpsc on fpdc around 24 sts cut off leaving 8 in for sewing sew lid to 2 sts on the pumpkin making sure the fpdc s match weave in ends tip recycle your kids bubble tape container or other plastic container or lid aprox 2 ½ inch diameter that would fit inside the pumpkin to keep its shape glue in place
